fullName.jp: ヴィンセント・ヴァレンタイン

description.jp: かつて 神羅の工作部隊「タークス」に所属していたガンマン。ある人体実験により 不老の身体と魔獣への変身能力を手に入れる。過去の過ちにさいなまれ棺の中で長年の眠りについていたがクラウドたちとの出会いを機に目覚め真実を目の当たりにする。
description.gl: A gunslinger and former Turk under Shinra. He was unethically experimented on, granting him eternal youth and the ability to shapeshift. Tormented by the mistakes of his past, he locks himself within a coffin for almost thirty years until being awakened by Cloud and setting out to tie up loose ends.

jp.text: フッ……お前たちにつきあうのも\n悪くはないな
フッ……\n戦いというものを教えてやろう
どうでもいいが\nやり方がスマートではないな……
あんたのその熱さが\nうらやましいよ……
悪夢にうなされる長き眠りこそ\n私に与えられたつぐないの時間

gl.text: It's only a matter of time for us.
Hmm... Being with you all isn't so bad.
Hmph...I'll show them what real fighting is.
I don't care what you're doing、 so much as the idiotic way you're doing it...
I wish I had your go-get-them attitude.
A nightmare? My long sleep has given me time to atone.

name.jp: 射撃サタンインパクト

desc.gl:
4-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 6 turns special effect Power of Chaos

While special effect Power of Chaos active:
 • Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
 • Deals BRV damage to all enemies equal to 10% of own MAX BRV at start of enemy's turn
 • BRV damage from Power of Chaos will not inflict Break
 • Does not stack with special effects of same name
 • Triggers Chaos Saber Shot (6-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack; deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%) when attacking enemy that has 2 or more debuffs (some attacks excluded; once per turn)
